participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and creative, enjoys the arts and has a strong sense of individuality.
participant_1.background: my favorite color is red. i am a christian. my sister is a pole dancer. i enjoy listening to classical music. i can drive a tractor.

participant_2.name: Leo
participant_2.personality: Playful and imaginative, loves to express himself through singing and has a childlike curiosity about the world.
participant_2.background: i like to talk but people have a hard time understanding. i like to look at blocks and sing about letters. i like to eat chocolate candy. when i grow up i want to be a dog.

content.text: Nice to see you :hug: how’s everything?
i’m going to the theatre now
